commentList.content: New hotel, excellent customer service, has free parking, comfortable bed.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好，感謝您百忙之中為小店做評論。漢庭對外經貿大學酒店坐落於北京北四環芍葯居甲2號院1號樓，距離北京地鐵10號線、13號線芍葯居站僅有800米的距離，交通十分便利。 有自助洗衣服務，機器人送物服務。這裡是您的出差，旅遊，外出辦公的首選地點。歡迎您的再次光臨

commentList.translatedContent: The room is very clean. There are free tea and books to read in the lobby. The service at the front desk is warm, professional and thoughtful with a smile. When you order takeout, a cute robot will deliver it to you. The lady in the room also takes the initiative to say hello. There is a bus stop at the door, and it takes ten minutes to walk to the subway. mouth. There is also a self-service laundry room and dryer on the second floor. Members can also use power banks for free within one hour and access the Internet for free. The most important thing is that there is a free parking space at the door, which saves a lot of trouble. Be sure to give 5 points of praise!
commentList.content: 房間非常乾淨，大廳有免費的茶水和書可以看，前枱面帶微笑服務熱情專業周到，點了外賣有可愛的機器人給送，客房大姐也主動問好，門口就是公交站，走路十幾分鍾到地鐵口。二樓還有自助的洗衣房和烘乾機，會員還可以一小時之內免費的充電寶，免費上網，最重要的是門口有免費的停車位省了很多麻煩事。一定要給5分好評！

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，非常感謝您對我們酒店的好評，我們會再接再厲不辜負您的好評，再次感謝您對酒店的肯定，期待再次光臨，祝旅途愉快
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you very much for your praise of our hotel. We will continue to work hard to live up to your praise. Thank you again for your affirmation of the hotel. We look forward to visiting you again. I wish you a pleasant journey.

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel has a good location, next to the subway and bus station, which is convenient for travel. The front desk service is particularly good. Snacks and fruits were also prepared. very good
commentList.content: 酒店地理位置不錯，挨着地鐵公交站，出行方便，前台服務特別好。還給準備了零食跟水果。很好

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，感謝您對我們工作的認可及肯定。 愛乾淨，住漢庭”是我們多年不變的的口號及工作內容。漢庭北京對外經貿大學酒店嚴格遵守華住集團的愛乾淨的條款，致力於為客人打造良好的酒店環境。漢庭北京對外經貿大學酒店坐落於北京北四環交通十分便利，臨近中日友好醫院，性價高。感謝您百忙之中為華住漢庭北京對外經貿大學酒店做評論。祝您諸事順利。
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for your recognition and affirmation of our work. "If you love cleanliness, stay at Hanting Hotel" is our slogan and work content that has remained unchanged for many years. Hanting University of International Business and Economics Beijing strictly abides by the cleanliness terms of Huazhu Group and is committed to creating a good hotel environment for guests. Hanting Hotel Beijing The University of International Business and Economics Hotel is located in Beijing's North Fourth Ring Road with very convenient transportation, close to the China-Japan Friendship Hospital, and has high cost performance. Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to leave a review for Huazhu Hanting Beijing University of International Business and Economics Hotel. I wish you all the best.

commentList.translatedContent:
I have stayed here three times this year when I visited Beijing. It is convenient for travel, safe and hygienic, the staff are friendly, the environment is clean, and the robot service is very convenient. I feel safe staying here.
I stay here for business trips and family trips.
commentList.content:
今年三次到北京，都是住的這裏，出行方便，安全衞生，服務員熱情，環境乾淨，機器人服務很便捷，住這裏很放心。
出差，親子游都是住的這裏。

feedbackList.content: 您好！感謝您5分的點評哦！每個城市總會有讓人惦念的理由，每個季節都有我們難捨的景色，每個酒店都有他們甜美而有温馨的回憶，希望漢庭會是您回憶裏最温馨最獨特的那個！常回漢庭看看哦，祝：安好！
feedbackList.translateContent: Hello! Thank you for your 5-point review! Every city always has its reasons for people to miss it, every season has its scenery that we can’t leave behind, and every hotel has its sweet and warm memories. I hope Hanting will be the warmest and most unique one in your memories. ! Come back to Hanting often and wish you well!

commentList.translatedContent: The environment is great. It’s the first choice for business trips. I will stay here again in Beijing.
commentList.content: 環境棒棒的，出差首選，還會再住來北京

commentList.translatedContent: Service: The lady at the front desk was very friendly and made my stay very comfortable. The environment is also very clean and the transportation is quite convenient. Breakfast is from Qingfeng Baozi Shop next door, which is quite delicious. The only drawback is that it's a bit small, but that's understandable in Beijing, where land is at a premium.
commentList.content: 服務：前台小姐姐服務非常熱情，住的很舒心。環境也很乾凈，交通也蠻方便的。早餐是隔壁慶豐包子鋪，還挺好吃。唯一的缺點就是有點小，但北京寸土寸金也能理解。
